participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, Emma loves exploring new cultures and trying different cuisines. She's open-minded and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Liam expresses himself through music and enjoys learning about different cultures through languages. He's enthusiastic and friendly.
participant_2.background: i am a musician. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.
